238095.「こ 怖がらないで ください……ミナサマに\n 危害を加えるつもりは ありません:
Please don't be afraid, I have no intention of
harming Mina Sama.

238097.「去年 手に入れた家が 願った内容と正反対の\n 暗くて じめじめとした家で……:
The house is dark and dreary, the exact
opposite of what the received family hoped for
last year.

238099.「怒りに駆られ ヒコボシ様に復讐するために\n ミナサマの短冊を 盗んだのデス。:
I was so angry that I stole minasama's paper
strip to take revenge on Hikoboshi-sama. I am
sorry for my personal feelings.

238103.「そ そういえば……去年 同じ名前のヒトが\n 家がほしいと 願っていたような…:
I remember last year someone with the same
name was asking for a house.

238105.「ヒコリン……\n ひょっとして 去年 ふたりの願いを\n 取り違えちゃったんじ:
Hikorin... maybe you and I got our wishes
mixed up last year?

238107.「オリリン……！？\n いつから そこに……？: Ori Wori! How long have you been there?

238109.「お仕事 まだかな～と思いながら さっきから\n ずーーっと 後ろで見てたんだ～:
I've been watching from the back, wondering if
you were at work yet!

238111.「盗みは いけないことだけど……事件は\n 解決したみたいだし ポカさんも とっ:
Stealing is wrong, but the case seems to be
closed, and Poca-san is very sorry, so let's
forgive him this time!

238113.「それに……家を取り違えられたのなら 今から\n ふたりの家を 交換しちゃえば\:
And if they got the wrong house, why don't
they just exchange their houses now? Wouldn't
that solve the problem?

238115.「コンナ迷惑を かけたのに\n 許してくださる ナンテ……ッ！\n ソレに ナイ:
I'm sorry for all the trouble I've caused you,
but you've forgiven me! And nice ideas too!

238117.「本当です どうして気づかなかったのでしょう！\n 私たちの家を 取り替えれば:
It's true. Why didn't I notice? We just need
to replace our house. Once that's decided,
we'll get ready to move in!

238119.「この難事件を あっさり解決するなんて……\n 美しさだけではなく 聡明さも備え:
Ori Wori is not only beautiful but also very
intelligent, and she solved this difficult
case so easily! I love you!

238121.「ふふっ……ヒコリンったら♪ 私もだよ！\n カッコイイのに たまに ちょーっと:
Heheh...Hikorin♪ Me too! I love Hikorin,
including the fact that he's cool but
sometimes a little out of his element.<heart>.

238129.「事件に 収まりがついて よかったです。\n しかし ヒコボシ様……二度と同じこ:
I am glad that the incident has been brought under control. However, Mr. Hikoboshi, we must tighten our belts even more so that the same
thing will not happen again.

238131.「それに 今回の事件を 解決できたのは\n <pc>さんの 行動あってこそ。\n:
Besides, it was only because of
<pc>'s actions that we were able to
solve this case. Let us be sure to thank them.

238133.「……そうですね。 <pc>さん\n この度は 願い人の短冊を 見つけてくださり:
Yes, it is. <pc> Thank you so much
for finding the wisher's paper strip.

238135.「私たちが 今年も無事に 巡りあえたのは\n あなたの助けが あったからこそです:
It is only with your help that we have been
able to come together again this year. Please
allow me to thank you in the least.

238137.「心優しき あなたのもとに\n いつか ステキなご縁が 訪れますよう\n 縁結び:
As the god of marriage, let me bestow my
blessing on you so that someday a wonderful
marriage will come to you with a kind heart.

238139.「そして 星が 何度巡ろうとも\n その縁が 変わりなく続きますように……。:
And no matter how many times the stars turn,
may the bond between us continue unchanged.

238141.「……それから これは 私から\n 願い人たちの短冊を 探してきてくれた\n お:
And this is my thanks for helping me find the
paper strip for my well-wishers.

238143.「それでは 私たちは ここで \n 今年の限られた時間を 共に過ごし\n よりい:
So here we are, spending our limited time this
year together, nurturing our love even more.

238145.「どうか あなたも\n 最後まで 七夕を楽しんでいってくださいね。:
Please enjoy the Tanabata Festival until the
end.

244255.「それが原因で\n 先日 妻にも 逃げらレ……:
That's why my wife ran away from me the other
day.

245073.「なんて うらやましいっ！\n 私も そんな家が ほしかったです！\n そうした:
I'm so envious! I wish I had a house like
that! Then I could have made lots of
mushrooms.
